definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: The earth and the sunshine are something everlasting which could never be forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 大地和陽光是絕然不會被遺忘的永恆。

sentences.english: Many people pose tradition and modernization as diametrically opposite.
sentences.chinese: 許多人將傳統與現代化絕然對立起來。

sentences.english: Now we are under very different circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 如今我們處在絕然不同的形勢下。

sentences.english: Cats and dogs have entirely different nature.
sentences.chinese: 貓與狗的天性絕然不同。

sentences.english: River the Zhi orchid facial expression one of unique however.
sentences.chinese: 江芷蘭神情一片的絕然。

sentences.english: If you can please give me a call.
sentences.chinese: 你怎能絕然離去，扔下我一人？
